tr.td: 1:50 dilution, permeabilized in 0.1% saponin, 2% FBS in humidifier at 37 degrees Celcius for 30 minutes. Cells cannot be fixed for longer than 7 minutes prior to staining.
1:500 dilution after stock mixed with 50% glycerol, permeabilized in 0.1% saponin, 2% FBS in humidifier at 37 degrees Celcius for 30 minutes
1:500 dilution in0.1% saponin, 2% FBS in humidifier at 37 degrees Celcius
1:500 dilution in 0.1% saponin, 2% FBS in humidifier at 37 degrees Celcius
Strain, strain background (Francisella tularensis, Live Vaccine Strain)
Strain, strain background (Francisella tularensis, Schu S4)
Strain, strain background (Francisella tularensis, inducibleT6SS mutant)

F. tularensis strain with an in-frame, markerless deletion of FTL_0119 (dotU) that is complemented with a pEDL17 plasmid containing dotU under the tetracycline inducible promoter and GFP on a constitutive promoter
Strain, strain background (Francisella tularensis, Empty Vector Control)
wildtype LVS that is complemented with a pEDL17 plasmid containing a kanamycin resistance cassette under the tetracycline inducible promoter and GFP on a constitutive promoter
Strain, strain background (Francisella tularensis, Empty Vector in ΔdotU)
A FTL_0119 deletion in LVS that is complemented with a pEDL17 plasmid containing a kanamycin resistance cassette under the tetracycline inducible promoter and GFP on a constitutive promoter
